plot: Chronicles the extraordinary life and legacy of the Australian Army nurse who survived a shipwreck, a massacre and three and a half years of living hell as a prisoner of the Japanese during World War I.
title: Vivian Bullwinkel: An Australian Heroine
plot_es: Chronicles the extraordinary life and legacy of the Australian Army nurse who survived a shipwreck, a massacre and three and a half years of living hell as a prisoner of the Japanese during World War I.
plot_en: Chronicles the extraordinary life and legacy of the Australian Army nurse who survived a shipwreck, a massacre and three and a half years of living hell as a prisoner of the Japanese during World War I.
